00024 class State;
00025 class TransitionInfo;

00027 
00034 class Transition
00035 {
00036   public:
00037     Transition(State*, State*, TransitionInfo*);
00038     Transition(const Transition& );
00039     ~Transition();
00040 
00041     Transition& operator=(const Transition& );
00042 
00044     State* getStart() { return start; };
00046     void setStart(State* s) { start = s; };
00048     State* getEnd() { return end; };
00050     void setEnd(State* s) { end = s; };
00052     TransitionInfo* getInfo() { return info; };
00054     void setInfo(TransitionInfo* i) { info=i; };
00055     
00056     static int conditionValid(int type, QString , bool input=TRUE);
00057 
00058   protected:
00060     State* start;
00062     State* end;
00064     TransitionInfo* info;
00065 };
